name: bo
description:
Bo is a 3D puzzle adventure game, that tries to tell a story without words. 

The game is about discovering, confronting and accepting all your flaws along with the beauty. Embracing your worthlessness along with your worthiness that helps you overcome your fears. It shows that beyond the all that fear, lies something beautiful.

The player flies around in this world where all the strutures are hidden. Then player has to use sonar to get a small glimpse of the world for a short time. There are clues spread across this which will help the player uncover this hidden world.

This is a demo version and work is in progress to complete the game.

Features

  • Simple flight mechanics to fly across and explore the world.
  • Smooth camera follow. No Camera control.
  • Sonar to see the bits of the world a little at a time and helps find the  clues to uncover the world.
